snippet.title: X INVADER: Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
"It's Time to hack!"
The early access trailer for X invader is now out!

The early access version of X invader will be revealed on August 23 at 11:00 AM (PDT) on Steam. 

#X-invader #indiegame #Steam #PC

X invader official Twitter:  https://twitter.com/home?lang=ko
X invader Discord server:  https://discord.gg/nVFsrQkGbr
